ChallengeDetails: Get past 4 screens in Crashman's stage from the mid point.
Land the plane.
Finish the first level with Raphael on the hardest difficulty.
Reach the boss door from the Dash Capsule in the given time.
Level 4-3: Ripsaw Rage, Start/end point: Beginning of level/end of level.
Clear the first three screens in three minutes (up to the autoscroller area).  Ignore any bells that appear, they will take you to bonus levels.
Beat stage one in 2 minutes.  Lose if game over.
No powerups, beat Stage 3 within the time limit (Picking up a powerup means you must suicide).
Get 70+ in the bullshit javelin event (mash B to run, up to throw).
Win the 110 Meter Hurdles event (mash B to run, up to jump).
Win the bullshit Hurdles event (mash A to run, B to jump).
Get a final time under 1m30s as Leonardo in the Big Apple Time Trial.
Complete a Tetris (4 lines) twice in one minute.
End of Spring Breeze, beat King DeDeDe with no ability.
Complete Yoshi's Island 3 within 1 minute.
Defeat the first boss (modified by Smite).
Get to the secret goalpost by diving under the first one. No time to waste! (modified by Smite).
Defeat Big Core.
Reach the Spade sphere on level one within one minute.
Defeat stage 1 boss (big guy with a chaingun arm) with only the standard weapon (and your lasso).
Beat 1-1 without losing the Frog Suit.
Stage 2: Ride the raft down the river and beat Kappa's raft.
Finish 1-1 of Super Mario Bros at 200% emulator speed.  Game overs are allowed (modded by Smite).
Survive balloon trip for one minute.
Get to 10,000 points in 2 ships/lives.
Win 1st round playing as Boomer (not full match, just first round) (match has 90 second time limit).
Chase the boss of Labyrinth Zone to the exit in 1 minute. BONUS: Keep your shield the whole time. ALT BONUS: Destroy Robotnik's craft.
Score twice! Start point: start of any game End point: once the player has scored twice.
Earn at least 12,000 points in stage 1. This includes end-of-level bonuses.
Defeat the first opponent as Blizzard! Start point: start of first round as Blizzard End Point: once they have won two rounds.
Win one round against first opponent as Shaq! start point: the first opponent in arcade mode.
Defeat the first boss! start point: screen where 1st boss spawns end point: when first boss dies.
Beat Boom-Boom in the first fortress without losing the Frog Suit.
Get a star in the matching game. Two tries!
Perform 15 Super jumps in one minute!
Start up single player and defeat the first opponent (i.e. win 2 rounds). Defeat is an automatic loss.
Beat the giant skull boss that lies ahead.
Beat Level 1 without shooting any enemies other than the boss! (i.e. no killing the dudes running around or turrets. You can kill the guard on the top of the boss and its turrets).
Stage 2, defeat the two mini-bosses. After boss 1, proceed right and wall climb till you face the second mini-boss.
Using the Blue Falcon, complete the track 'Big Blue' both in first place and in less than 2:30:00.  Save State starts at the opening of the track.
Go to Merv's Burger Joint in Waterfront Mall and get a free Smile. Fast message speed, challenge is done when you confirm the order.
Complete Special Level 2 ('Dolphin Passage'). Starts at beginning of level, ends when you touch the goal block.
Beat the boss of stage 1 with an un-upgraded whip and no subweapon. Challenge ends when you grab the orb.
CLEAR FOUR ROOMS OF QUICKLASER MOTHERFUCKER!
Get to the next area from the starting location. You have 1 minute.
Beat the boss. Plenty of sub weapons are available.
Beat the ceiling boss with 1 life and default weapon.
beat the UFO boss with 1 life and default weapon.
beat the wall boss with 1 life and default weapon.
Beat Chill Penguin with the buster without being hit, 1 try.
Beat Launch Octopus with the buster. You get a few HP upgrades & dash.
Beat the intro stage in 1 minute (starting from when you gain control).
Beat the Ostrich with the buster in under a minute.
Beat Morph Moth with the buster in under 90s.
Start Wheel Gator's stage and get the Buster power up. You have Strike Chain.
Get a perfect bonus round (20 balloons).
Beat Dracula with the leather whip & holy water. You can have three tries. GOOD LUCK!
Clear level 31. You have many extra lives, but only 1 minute.
Beat the first team, America, in 2 minutes on normal. BONUS: Beat England as well!
Kill one person in Bean Ball on normal. BONUS: Kill em all!
It's the shadow team! Double-tap forward to run, B attacks and catches (with timing), A passes. Run 5~ steps and then attack for super attacks!
Finish the World 8 Airship with the frog suit. You are allowed 2 tries. GOOD LUCK!
Clear stage 1 in under a minute. Complain about Bubsy while you do it.
Beat the cheap UFO boss of stage 15. You have multiple lives but only 1 minute.
collect 80 yarn in Chapter 7 in under 1 minute. Complain about trains while you do it.
Defeat Fry Guy with Toadstool & 2 HP in under 1 minute.
Complete level 2 of Adventure Island. End the level while on a skateboard.
Defeat Mech Pilot Carlos as fast as possible! (Remember to switch to Super Scope controls).
Defeat the mech WITHOUT blowing off its... dangle bits. (Remember to switch to Super Scope controls).
Win the match! Controls may have been rearranged!
Win the match! Chun Li vs. Vega. Controls may have been rearranged!
Defeat Ovnunu, the eyeball, in 2 minutes with the Earth Gargoyle.
Win "Trio the Pago," the headbutt skull game, on medium difficulty.
Beat the Hippogriff, fast!
Quickly climb to the top of the tower and enter the highest door.
Beat level 1-1 in 2 minutes with any character. The left path in the cave is illegal!
Beat Vanilla Dome 4, fast! 90 seconds given.
Successfully perform a high jump. BONUS: Do it three times without touching the bar.
Break a red clay pidgeon in the Skeet Shooting event. BONUS: Never miss a clay pigeon, then shoot the UFO!
Beat Big Boo in 90 seconds! You'll need to find them first, too. Take Damage to save time!
Beat Donut Plains 4, fast! You might have time to make an error or two.
Beat Chocolate Island 3, fast! Risky jumps will pay off! 90 seconds on the clock give a bit of leniency.
Beat Chocolate Island 1, fast! You might have time to make an error or two.
Clear 25 lines, fast! This isn't too hard if you're familiar with tetris.
Starting at the beginning of the first stage with homing, ranger, flame, and sword as your weapons, defeat the first boss.
Complete Space Mountain ride.
Beat Panhandle Pete on the race track.
Beat the ghost area. Good luck with that! You have two tries, no time limit.
Beat the trash train within 2 minutes. You have a few lives.
Save the villagers from the pirates and escape! Good luck! You have two tries, no time limit.
Beat the mummy boss within 90 seconds. Don't fall off!
Beat Slogra within 2 minutes. Stay low to the ground in phase 1, and far away in phase 2! Good luck!
Bonus items are hidden on an invisible path under the stairs. Get 1 whip upgrade and get back up to the steps. You have multiple lives but only 1 minute.
In two minutes, kill yourself in 5 unique ways (Load State upon seeing the reaper.)
Beat stage 1 with any pilot.
Beat the Stealth Fighter stage with Shin and the default plane.
Beat the Aerial Squadron stage with Shin and the default plane.
Beat the first boss. May inform players that UP+Jump inverts gravity.
Get 20,000 points in footbag event (includes variety bonus at the end).
Beat Zone F in 2 minutes (or game over).
Complete Green Hill Zone 1. BONUS: Also collect 50 rings and enter the bonus stage at the end.
Finish Level One without losing Baby Mario at all.
Finish level one without gliding.
Beat the Hippogriff in two minutes. (note: it's the transition boss halfway through stage 1).
Complete Level 2 (Password: HMPR).
Kill Jaws. You have 3 strobes to try with.
Beat level 1-1 of The Lost Levels without dying as Luigi. Time is short!
Score a goal before the time runs out!
Starting at the boss, defeat the boss.
Beat the first stage without power-ups. (Grabbing a powerup means suicide).
Beat 4-2 (the whale stage) as Luigi! 2 minute limit, no warps allowed!
Starting from Wave 17, beat the egg wave on Stage 20.
Defeat Jafar! Start point when Jafar lifts his snake head, end point once he's dead. Password for the level: Aladdin | Jasmine | Abu | Sultan
World 1, Level 7: Challenge is to not touch Fuzzy. Touching is an automatic loss. Beat the stage.
Defeat the stage 2 boss
World 1 Level 1: Do not turn any enemies into eggs and complete the level. The egg block and spitting enemies out is okay.

Defeat Quackerjack. Time limit is 1:30.
 Down+A lets you drop and hang from your current platform. While hanging, down with no other input drops you to the ground.
Beat Phase 2 of game B. Timer starts when the game begin jingle ends and the player can control Mario. A tightly timed challenge.
Beat the first boss and listen to the "I'M BAD" voice clip. Bonus: Beat him in 50 seconds.
Get 90 points in the "Sky Diving" lesson. Be sure to look at the instructions! (desc. shortened by Smite)
Get 96 points in the "Light Plane" lesson. Be sure to look at the instructions! (desc. shortened by Smite)
Rocketbelt (state 2). Gather 70+ points by flying through the three rings and landing in the target zone, fast!
Light Plane (state 2), the player should fly through all of the rings and land successfully in under a minute.
Skydiving (state 2). Gather 70 points by falling through the rings and landing in a good spot.
Clear level 1 in 90 seconds. You must grab the dactyl!
Touch all three bars and land on any of the targets for any amount of points in under 2 minutes.
Land in the center of the ring (the 50 pts area). Three tries allowed.
Get at least 30 points in the bonus level by bouncing on P's. Falling into the water ends in failure, except at the target zone!
Continue up the ladder and get the letter at the very top. (The hack is called Air Sliding for a reason!)
Beat stage 1 in 2 minutes.
Beat stage A in 90s. Climb the tree!
Beat stage B in 2 minutes.
Beat stage C in 2 minutes.
Beat stage G in 2 minutes.
Beat stage J in 3 minutes.
Get past the quick lasers and beat quick man in 2 minutes.
From the halfway point, beat Metal Man in 2 minutes.
Beat Shadowman within 2 minutes using only the buster.
Beat Gemini Man in 1 minute.
Survive Snake Man without shooting him for 1 minute! Robo-snakes are God's creatures too!
Beat Magnet Man from the start within 3 minutes.
Beat Magnet Man using the Gemini Laser. If you run out, you're permitted to use the Search Snake.
From the title screen, beat Star Man in 3 minutes.
From the title screen, beat Gravity Man.
Take down Crystal Man using only Power Stone! If you run out, you are allowed to use the buster to finish the job. Only 1 try.
From the state, beat the boss without dying!
Beat the first stage on normal difficulty.
Beat the Stampede on difficult in one try.
Get killed by the Gorilla in "Hakuna Matata." You'll have to go through the stage first!
Beat the first boss!
Defeat the giant Snakey! Moving starts the challenge.
Defeat the giant Rocky! Moving starts the challenge.
Defeat King Egger!
Destroy Regenertoid (all forms). This is the level 3 boss. BONUS: Do so without getting hit.
Get more than 20 points in the bonus round! One try.
Starting from just outside Ganon's room, head up and defeat Ganon!
Enter the top left teleporter and meet Heat Man. Kill him using only the regular Buster.
Defeat Horsehead. You may use the Shield spell if you wish. BONUS: Don't use the shield spell.
Get through the first screen of the area in the state.
Beat The Boss within the time limit.
Defeat the first boss within a minute.
Ride on the Clinger Winger and survive for 1 minute! Dying makes you lose the challenge.
Beat the first section of the Turbo Tunnel race! If you die, you can reload your state to try again. BONUS: Win this and clear next section in one try!
Bonus act! Maneuver through at least 10 rings (out of 12) and land in the water in 1 attempt. Timer is irrelevant.
Beat Robo-Manus within the time limit. You've plenty of lives!
Score 1000 points.
Score 1000 points in 90 seconds from start. (ram into the pipes for power ups)
Head to the right and beat the boss that jumps out!
Defeat Myotia using only your subweapon. Remember that X uses Item Crash! Careful 1 accidental whip is okay. More than that is failure.
Finish Round 1 (beat Thrasher).
Selection B -> Race 3: Beat the 3rd place time to win!
Get in the hole within 4 shots! This means a resulting score of +5 or greater after the hole is a fail! No retries.
Defeat the first two levels within 90 seconds (real time). There is a dash button, FYI.
Get a KO or TKO on Von Kaiser with a special uppercut! Just using it doesn't count! (Press start when you have a star to use one!)
A-Type > Level 10 (Hold A while selecting Level 0 with start button): Survive + create at least 1 Tetris.
Beat the third boss (Kapan, the Turtle). He's immune to freeze, so kick his shells back at him!
Beat the stage. Freeze the blocks and push them into the springs, fill up the holes and collect the bags.
Beat the second boss (Piro, the clown). He's immune to freeze, use his own attack against him!
Your mermaid vacation has gone horribly wrong. Beat the stage in 3 minutes or else you will freeze to death.
Go south, pass through the rocky cliffs, enter the forest clearing, and obtain the heart.
SURPRISE DRAWBAGE. Do a Drawbage challenge using Mario Paint instead of MS paint.
Beat Kraid in 2 minutes
Beat the scorpion boss within the time limit. Reload if you die.
Beat the Pharoah within 1 minute. Reload if you die. You have an alternate weapon if you want it.
Beat the alien orb thing within 90 seconds. Reload if you die. Watch your step!
Beat Zoda-Y within 2 minutes. Reload if you die. You have 3 different weapons!
Defeat Gazh the Dino Biker!
Defeat Shroom! ('This guy kicked my ass so I changed the difficulty to 5' -- Smite)
Defeat Medusa! (Time limit lowered to 2m by Smite)
Defeat the Rock Alien! (Time limit lowered to 2m by Smite)
Beat the boss dog thing!
Get to the next screen. You can be underwater, but not hit the bottom.
Beat the boss in 90 seconds. Double tap to dash!
Collect 400 golden ostriches with Espresso! There is a trick to make this really easy, but can be done without it.
Pacifist run Stage 1 - Kill the boss but do not kill enemies or gain power ups.
Pacifist run stage 2-1, reach stage 2-2 - do not kill enemies or hit power ups.
Clear the special stage.
Beat Awesome. You have 1 minute, so good luck!
Starting from where you find Squawks, finish Squawks's Shaft in 1 minute!
Finish the Rickety Race in first place!
Beat the bonus round. Do it in one try for bonus points!
Beat the Squawks portion of Animal Antics. You win by entering the barrel which transforms you into the snake.
Reach the checkpoint barrel in Rattle Battle!
Defeat Hidon! Wait, where's your gear? Better think of something... (you also lose if you game over)
Complete the race without exploding! (You'll start with a few dents.)
Complete the course to activate the secret warp! Make sure to touch the flagpole at the end!
Beat Mine Cart Carnage without using the stupid warp barrel cheat. You've time for some errors.
Beat Tree Top Town. The dumb warp barrel is illegal, so even if you know where to find it, don't use it.
Beat Blackout Basement in 2 minutes. What a painful experience for you!
Get 400 ostrich tokens in Espresso's bonus game. There is a secret that will make this way easier, but isn't necessary to win. BONUS: Get 700 tokens.
Get 400 swordfish tokens in En Guarde's minigame. There is a secret that will make this way easier, but isn't necessary to win. BONUS: Get 700 tokens.
Get 400 frog tokens in Winky's minigame. There is a secret that makes this way easier, but isn't necessary to win. BONUS: Get 700 tokens.
Get through the spring gauntlet at the end of Plant Man's stage. The challenge ends when you reach the boss gates.
Get 10th place or better on this custom course! Press start on 'Mode B'. BONUS: 3rd or better
Beat Egrobo in The Drill Mobile (Underground) with Knuckles in under one minute.
Kill Spiderman and then Batman with this dumb shinobi! Modified by Smite.
Beat the Drill Mobile Piloted (Sky) by Robotnik with Sonic and Tails! You have 2m. You can double-jump with that shield!
Beat Dracula's final form as Grant.
Defeat the Cyclops. Its head is its weak point!
Defeat the boss in one minute! Bonus: Do it in one life!
Start a new game and select Forte. Enter the boss door in the intro stage within 2m. Forte can dash with the A button and double-jump!
Defeat Robonik's weird screaming scorpion mech! Death isn't much of a threat here, but you can fall out of the boss arena and have to make your way back up.
Defeat Dyna Blade in 90s! Use any power you like. BONUS: Do it with the wing power you start with. (modified by Smite)
Make it through both of Ice Man's disappearing block puzzles. BONUS: Do it with a minute to spare!
Kill the Angry Sun with a turtle shell.

Count Slobbula only needs to be damaged 1 more time, can you figure out how to do it within the time limit? Timer starts when player unpauses and victory occurs when the remote to the next level appears. State reloads are allowed.
Catch the disc in the Flying Disc event. (Note: Set speed and angle with d-pad only. Pressing A makes your catcher die! --Smite).
Reach the boss of Level 2 and kill it. (BUMPED UP TO 5 BY ME, SMITE!)
Collect 50 rings by the end of the first level to spawn a giant ring, then jump in it. BONUS: Do it in under 60s.
Reach the boss of the level, you do not have to fight it. You are allowed state reloads or continues.
Defeat the Stage 1 Boss. No glitches allowed! BONUS: Do it without using the bombs (Bombs are on the A button)
Defeat the Stage 2 Boss. No glitches allowed! BONUS: Do it without using the bombs (Bombs are on the A Button)
Defeat the Stage 3 Boss. No glitches allowed!
Defeat Helmethead! BONUS: Don't use magic.
Defeat Ironknuckle! Downstab the horse to get started.
Fillmore act 1 (first level). Rush through and defeat the centaur.
Bloodpool, act 1. Watch your step! There is time to recover from death, if you're fast. You have limited uses of the fireball spell, which is good for the boss.
Kasandora, act 1. You have limited uses of star rain, which can be a good boss-killing spell. Look out for healing apples!
Marahna, act 1. You have limited uses of star rain, which is not very effective against the boss. Look out for healing apples!
You have 90 seconds to beat the boss of Marahna act 2. You have 1 use of star rain, which deals some good damage... usually!
Beat this weird robot thing. Watch your Kunai count!
Defeat the Hydra by any means necessary. Bonus: Use kicks only [Down + B in the air] (modified by Smite)
Classic Mode! Starting from the moment you can control Kirby in Spring Breeze, reach and beat Wispy Woods without gaining any powers.
Get to the final area. You have the whip and a vest. You can find guns and use them with the select button.
From the midpoint, finish the 2nd bullet stage. It uses the controller to aim and fire.
Beat Mute City in the Knight League within the time limit. BONUS: Finish in 1st place.
Finish Red Canyon 2 within 2 minutes. 2 laps are done already. BONUS: First place.
Finish Port Town 2 in first place within 2 minutes. 2 laps are done already.
Finish Silence in first place. 2 laps are completed already.
Take down King Hippo in a single round.
Take out Bald Bull in one round. BONUS: Never get knocked out.
Take down Popinski within 3 minutes. This'll be tough!
Clear the intermediate race in 1 minute. BONUS: Have +40 seconds left on the in-game timer.
Clear the Aerial race in 1 minute (real time). Warning! Avoid the bottom route at the fork! BONUS: Have +50s left on the in-game timer.
Complete the ultimate race in 1 minute! Don't forget about the dash button! Good Luck!
Beat Emerald Hill Zone in 2 minutes (including the boss). Go fast!
Beat the first stage. Use any team you want (teams are different. The 1st seems stronger while the 2nd and 3rd seem easier to control).
Reach the chopper in stage 2-1. You don't have to beat it. My team recommendation is Hot Flash, but it's up to you! They are the easiest to control.
Defeat SPEL! You have 3 power-strikes (Y Button). Hit the Orb to attack! L/R moves wizard.
Rock the Scorpions like a hurricane! Hit the fire orb to attack! L/R moves wizard.
Clear 15 screens in 2 minutes. Just keep going, it's completely random!! You have all the weapons by the way. BONUS: Clear 20 screens in the same time limit.
Clear 24 screens in 3 minutes. Just keep going, it's completely random!! You have all the weapons by the way.
Take down the boss of stage 1 in 3 minutes. You can grab the fences for a boost up when you need to. BONUS: Take no damage.
Grab a power pellet and eat all four ghosts! BONUS: Do it again within the time limit.
Beat Gravitus in 2 minutes. Punch punch punch. (time limit increased to 2m -- Smite)
Beat Riverside Race in less than 1:20 in the in-game clock. Be careful with the bees! BONUS: Beat it in 1m game time. (modded by Smite)

GameTitle: Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
ChallengeDetails: Beat the Desert Palace boss in 90s.  Sword only, but charged spin attack is allowed
Just get out of the house. That's it. What could possibly go wrong!
Get $200 or above in the "Cracker" mini-game, ya imbecile! If you last that long, let the game end after 2 minutes. BONUS: Get $400+
Collect every egg in the Egg Catching Minigame.
Defeat Gundam Bot within 1 Minute. Added Difficulty/Bonus: Don't pickup any weapons, only use your default gun
Defeat Flame Tank within 2 minutes. (I gave an extra life) Bonus: don't pick up any weapons, use only your default gun.
Defeat Brain Bot within 2 minutes (if you think its too easy, i found this boss a tough bone to chew)
Defeat Crab Bot in 2 minutes Bonus: don't pick up any weapons, use only your default gun.
Defeat Wing Man within 2 minutes (im terrible with naming things). Bonus: don't pick up any weapons
Defeat Robotnik in 2m. The 1st form is damaged by luring the homing missiles into the cockpit, the 2nd form is dashed into. Watch your rings!
Escape out the top of the Bonus 1 stage in 90s. Tip: You fly farthest if you jump when Sonic overlaps the center of the gravity orbs.
From save state, defeat all challengers! You are dressed in all white.
Get $200 in the pie game. Press a stooge's direction to dodge. Combine with the A button to throw a pie. Left: Moe -- Down: Curly -- Right: Larry. BONUS: Get $400+!
Get $200 in the hospital game. Collect the dropped stuff without hitting too many patients. Going faster is worth more. BONUS: Get $400
Beat the boxing challenge! Larry needs to run to the radio store and back to play 'pop goes the weasel' for Curly so he can win in his dumb skit. Good luck!
Defeat a section of Stage 1 and the Boss within 1:30 seconds. Holding down and jump lets you pass through platforms. BONUS: Complete it in 1 minute.
Beat Bear Hugger in 1 minute
Successfully destroy your target in Stage 2. You have three tries. Hint: collect the bomb and drop it on the battleship!.
Successfully bomb your target in Stage 1. Collect the bomb and drop it on the building center!
Defeat the Octoboss in 90s. You have 1 health, but may reload as many times as you like. Hold punch to fire a shot!
Unpause the game and head right. Defeat the boss! You get one try. Hold punch to fire a shot!
Unpause and defeat the boss in one minute. Hold punch to fire a shot!
Unpause the game and defeat the boss in under 1:30. NOTE: You can ride the pink balloons. BONUS: Do it with no damage
Clear stages 3-1 and 3-2. (Hit Select to change weapons.) BONUS: Don't jump in the boss fight.

Clear 7 buildings in this ridiculously hard mode! Hold B and release to use the pole at the best angle, or to grab unicycles. A throws items away. B also jumps, but good luck making that. (Thanks DoubleGomez)
Score more points than the other team in the allotted time, you can use any team members. Bonus points for winning by over 30 points.
Score more points than the other team, any team setup. Bonus for winning by over 30 points.
Defeat the Giant Mouser in 90 seconds! Sorry, no Donnie.
Defeat the final boss! Watch out for the big tank cannon that fires when you move in front of it.
Swing to the left and go into the boss room! You've got 1 minute.
Refuel your plane!
Destroy the aircraft carrier!
State 1 - Make it through three Section transitions (the two beam-looking things at the end of an area) in under two minutes! No state reloads!
State 3 - Survive Section 14, and then head up at the dual teleporters to Section 16. Defeat the boss there, which should be easy if you've still got the V-lasers!
Kill Abobo x 2! You have one minute and thirty seconds.
Defeat Chin! All of them!
Defeat Machine Gun Willy! You have two minutes!
Defeat your brother, Jimmy Lee, within 2 minutes!
Beat Mission 3! You fail if you die twice. Bonus: Knock both Abobos (the huge guys) out of the helicopter.
Make it to the door above!
Defeat your shadow.  You have 2 minutes.
Defeat the Shadow Warrior!
Complete the first three waves by landing on top of the enemy jousters and collecting the eggs they leave behind.
Beat the Super Gondola. You're fixed shot and only have single flame. Have fun! (90s time limit -- Smite).
Show Bruce who's the boss by defeating him with Shiva. Animal cruelty (killing Roo) results in instant failure! BONUS: Defeat Bruce in one minute.
Beat the boss of the asteroid section (Rock Crusher) within 2 minutes!
Player must defeat the crab boss within 2 minutes and 3 lives available. A shot speed power-up is available for use. (Press Select)
Player must reach the end of the stage by jumping over all chasms and avoiding hazards.
Player must defeat the Serpent boss within 1 minute and 3 lives.
Beat Metal Head. (Bonus: Do not take damage.)
Beat Rat King at the end of the stage. (Bonus:Don't die.)
Clear the 1st stage in 2 minutes! Rescuing glowing soldiers will upgrade your grenades. BONUS: Do it in 80 seconds.
Clear the 2nd stage within 2 minutes. Rescuing glowing soldiers will upgrade your grenades. The regular ones won't do anything for you but points.
Clear the 3rd stage within 2 minutes. Destroy the battleship! Rescuing glowing soldiers will upgrade your grenades. The regular ones won't do anything for you but points.
Beat the 4th stage within 2 minutes. Rescuing glowing soldiers will upgrade your grenades. The regular ones won't do anything for you but points.
Kill everyone in the way of you and a helicopter ride, with one life. Reload if you like.
In game mode B, choose any fighter you want and win the mirror match within 2 minutes!
Beat Moose and Rocko. You can try as many times as you want. BONUS: Do it without using the water. (modified by Smite)
Clear Stage 32 within three minutes. Collect all the carrots. The punching glove can kill 1 enemy by firing.
Defeat Axel Gear at Mech Boxing!
Save the dam! Defuse at least 5 of the 8 bombs in 2:20 (but don't use the in game clock). Bonus: defuse all 8. You have two turtles you can switch between mid-stage.
Score 25/40 in the Skeet Shooting Challenge. BONUS: Get 30!
Head towards the upper right part of the map and enter the temple.  TIP: Press A + B together to jump.  Enemies can be ignored.
Beat the Copy Robot using only these weapons: Rolling Cutter (C), Thunder Beam (E) and Hyper Bomb (B). Time starts once the boss fight properly begins due to long intro.
Beat the boss (Atomic Base) of space armada in 2 minutes starting from the entrance tunnel. BONUS: Do it flawless!
Beat the spider boss (Dancing Insector) within 90s. Destroy the legs to reach it's core, and watch out for fire!
Beat Andross, starting from the entrance to his base on venom. Your ship is fully powered. You only get 1 try! BONUS: Do it flawlessly.
Defeat Water Rabbit without ever letting Dale die, because Dale is the best Rescue Ranger. Throw him to safety often.If Dale dies you must reload.
Defeat the enemy aircraft! Shoot the front propellers to take it down. A: Attack, B: Special (uses HP, but acts like a shmup bomb)
Defeat all three battleships. A: Attack, B: Special (uses HP, but acts like a shmup bomb)
Defeat the aircraft carrier! A: Attack B: Special (uses HP, acts like a shmup bomb)
Defeat Clawgrip, the boss of 5-3 within 1 minute! You have Mario, 2 hits, and as many tries as you want.
Defeat Duck Vader in the special stage by landing on his head 3 times. You can get a higher jump when landing on an enemy while holding B.
Defeat Joker. His health is in the top center. Projectiles charge over time for power. Punch by getting in close (recommended).
Defeat the train boss! You have i-frames when striking the enemy. You can charge your attack for a jet attack, but the sword is fastest.

Reach and land a hit on Captain Fleagle, and then go down the front of the ship and turn left quicky! Don't fall! Defeat the robot pigbat there. Hold attack for jetpack, if you want to use it. BONUS: Get all the way to the door in time too!
Reach the end of the level and beat the boss. Find the dino buddy to speed things up a bit!
Defeat Final Great Soldier (and Smash Daisaku too, I guess)!
Defeat the boss without getting a game over. BONUS: Do not use bombs. Y is autofire, B is swing which can deflect projectiles, X is slide (ill-advised), A is manual fire, L is bomb.

Endure the cabin's gauntlet and defeat the Genie miniboss in the next room within the time limit. You have 1 life but time to retry! Y is autofire, B is swing (deflects projectiles), X is slide, A is manual fire, L is bomb.
Defeat the mini-boss of stage 3 within the time limit. BONUS: Do it in 90s. Y is autofire, B is swing (which can deflect some projectiles), X is slide, A is manual fire, L is bomb
Defeat Dracula Duck, then reach the treasure before Glomgold in one minute. Bonus: Defeat him without taking damage.
Collect $250,000 in the Amazon area on Normal difficulty in two minutes.
Collect $200,000 in the Moon area on Normal difficulty in two minutes.
Win the first race! You only get one try. Collect the letter "N" for 10 bonus points.
Win the second race! You only get one try. Collect the letter "I" for 10 bonus points.
Defeat the boss! Bonus: Don't lose any lives. Y is autofire, X is slide, A is manual fire.
Win the first race. Buy nitro!!!
Defeat the Green Grub (Round 4 Boss)
Defeat the Mad Monk (Round 5 Boss)
Chase down and defeat the Stone Wizard (Round 8). This is hard as heck, but should be doable. Clouds are platforms!
Complete Dive Man's stage in 3 minutes.
Complete Skull Man's stage in 3 minutes.
Defeat Rocksteady without dying. You have time to retry!
Defeat Bebop without dying. You have time to retry!
Beat the first level without attacking. Bonus points for never picking up a weapon.
Beat 10 levels in 2 minutes from the start.
Beat the first level in 1 minute. BONUS: Do it in one life (modded by Smite)
Clear the first stage. For whatever reason, UP is jump in this game! If you find a gun, press A to shoot it instead of using your knife. Bonus: Clear in 1 life.
Defeat the jetpack dudes! Up jumps and B knifes, that's all you need.
Finish the obstacle course better than 4th, you can pick any character. Bonus for coming 1st. (A hits forward, B hits backwards/throws weapon, A+B to jump)
Finish the obstacle course better than 4th, you can pick any character. Bonus for coming 1st. (A hits forward, B hits backwards/throws weapon, A+B to jump)
If your team (you + the guy in blue) break the ball you win, retries are allowed. Bonus for not letting the other team hit the ball at all in your winning attempt. (Mash up to climb the pole).
Complete all of stage 6. Note that propellers hurt.
Clear the floor and beat the wizard! You have 90 seconds.
As Toad, clear the waterfall area and enter the door in 1 minute!   Bonus: Defeat the Birdo and enter the door within that time.
Win the 4-man brawl! Different characters have different special moves. Anyone who falls off the stage is eliminated, don't let it be you!
beat the bandana guy, Shinji. You have 4 characters you can switch between! Hit select to do so. Don't let any of them die or it's over. hold L and press a button to do special moves.
Beat the bandana guy, Shinji, and his buddy! You have 4 characters you can switch between! Hit select to do so. Don't let any of them die or it's over. hold L and press a button to do special moves.
Beat the pair of bosses! You have 4 characters you can switch between! Hit select to do so. Don't let any of them die or it's over. hold L and press a button to do special moves.
Beat the pair of bosses at the disco! You have 4 characters you can switch between! Hit select to do so. Don't let any of them die or it's over. hold L and press a button to do special moves.
As Luigi, grab the key and go down the vertical area. Go out the door and unlock the door on your left. Drop the key to stop being chased!
As Mario, head to the right and defeat the Birdo you find at the end in under a minute!
As Peach, make your way to the right through the cloud section, then climb the vertical area to open the door within 2 minutes. Bonus: Defeat the Birdo behind the door.
Climb the South American waterfall (finish stage 5-1). You can slash downward by holding Down, and change weapons with Select. Also, waterfalls are not land.
Beat the stage 7 boss, Select changes weapons, but I recommend grenades! You have a lot of them, but not infinite.
Make it through the sewers of 7-2. You have 3 lives; if you game over, you lose. Be cautious. Use select to changes weapons.
Using Axel, defeat and the woman with the whip and the level boss in 90s! (hint: you need to use forward+A)
Defeat the boss! Bonus: Win in the first life with no damage taken!
Beat the Casino Night Eggman fight in 90s. You have one ring.
Finish the rug ride level in the lava area. You get three tries.
Defeat the final boss of Super R-Type in 3 minutes. A shoots the option forward and recalls it! Reload the savestate if you die to get your weapons back.
Defeat the boss of Episode 2 under 2 minutes. You only have half health, sorry about that. Should be enough though.
Time for powwow! You're fully loaded, defeat Chief Wigwam! Reloading state is allowed. Don't forget, you can slide with the A button- it may or may not help you out though.
Get eaten by the tiger in front of the boss door! You'll have to go through a few rooms first! (modded by Smite)
From the starting point, get Simon Greedwell to read death quote within two minutes.
Take down the infamous Hank Hatfield in 60 seconds. Draw, Pilgrim!
Shoot at least 35 enemies in the bonus round! Hold a direction (diagonal included) and Y to shoot that location. BONUS: Get a perfect score!
You're at Napalm man's boss gate; now take him down! This is NOT the same Mega Man V boss fight. You can perform a slide in midair and it is essential. You may want to practice before heading in.
Clear 1 day and keep at least 8 subscribers!
Clear the stage within 2 minutes! Hold A to shoot your gun, tap it to throw grenades if you get some. B can be used to dodge by running faster or rolling.

Get through the laser gauntlet at the end of Ring Man's stage in 1 minute, without getting hit!  Jump down the pit to your right and run for the boss shutter!  You are allowed to load state as many times as you want until time runs out.

Beat Drill Man using only the Mega Buster in two minutes.  You have one E-Tank, but all the health in the world doesn't matter if you get crushed!  Load state if you die.  BONUS: Beat him without the E-Tank!

Beat Bright Man, the Smartest Robot Master using only the Mega Buster in two minutes.  You have one E-Tank, but it won't matter if you can't stay out of the light!  Reload state if you die. BONUS: Beat him without using the E-Tank!

Beat the first section of level 1 (Second Samurai) on Expert! Dash by tapping forward twice. Throw kunai by standing still and attacking from range. Tapping C twice will get you a double jump and you can block attacks by holding B.
Score 80k points on the Ultraman table (the city with planes on it) before a Game Over!
Score 80k points on the Kamen Rider table (the field with 5 monsters) before a Game Over!
Score 80k points on the Fighter Roar table (underwater) before a Game Over!
Score 80k points on the Knight Gundam table (outer space) before getting a Game Over!
Buster duel heat man and win! (top-left). BONUS: Take out any other boss in the time limit with another buster duel.

Climb the vertical section, then head right and clear the dancing robot twins, and their big brother, in 2 minutes! (Beating the robots is all about movement, stick to the walls and ceiling to avoid their attacks!)
Jump from rocket to rocket, and defeat the Sky Base boss in under 2 minutes! You need to shoot off the top and bottom cannons to expose the Base's weak spot!

Clear the desert stage by destroying the 5 glowing structures on the map, and then the boss! Arrows will show you which direction the nearest enemy spawner is at. (Use R and L to control the rotation of your character!)
From the start of the stage, clear both the Alien heart, and the Alien Crab-faced monster mini-bosses in under 2 minutes.
Buster duel bubble man and win! (center-left). BONUS: Take out any other boss in the time limit with another buster duel.
Buster duel wood man and win! (bottom-left). BONUS: Take out any other boss in the time limit with another buster duel.
Clear 15 screens in 2 minutes. You have all your equipment. Bonus: do it in Unarmed Start (no special weapons).
Clear Stage 5-6 in under two minutes! Careful jumping!

Hammer Time! Clear out every enemy in the Ice Fortress and defeat the Boom-Boom at the end using hammers only! (Hint: All the ? blocks in the stage are power-ups. Resist the temptation of hitting them!)
Hammer Time! Using your Hammer Bros suit, destroy every plant in the stage via liberal use of hammers (excluding the invulnerable black pirahna plants) in 2 minutes!
Go into the World 7 Fortress and, while invincible, run and jump your way to the first Thwomp. Kill off said Thwomp with a Star-powered body check in one minute! (Reload the state as necessary.)
Clear out the Andore arena in 2 minutes! BONUS: Do it without picking up any of the weapons in the arena!
Mayor Haggar loves dogs! Kill all the enemies by the dog at the end of the bathroom.
Mayor Haggar! Photo-op time! Ride out the subway train and exit at your stop in 2 minutes!

Select Stunt Trax: Pick a vehicle (4WD and Coupe are easiest for the stunt courses.) On Rock Field: Complete the stage with at least 35 Stars. Bonus: Collect all the stars! (Use select to change the camera view, Y is boost, B is acceleration, A is brake. L/R for hard turns)

Select Stunt Trax: Pick a vehicle (4WD and Coupe are easiest for the stunt courses.) On Ice Dance: Complete the stage with at least 30 Stars! (Use select to change the camera view, Y is boost, B is acceleration, A is brake. L/R for hard turns)
Select Free Trax: Pick any vehicle (recommended: 2WD). On Sunset Valley: Get under 2m time.  (Use select to change the camera view, Y is boost, B is acceleration, A is brake. L/R for hard turns)
Select Free Trax: Pick any vehicle. On Night Cruise: Get 2:50 or lower! (Use select to change the camera view, Y is boost, B is acceleration, A is brake. L/R for hard turns)
Beat Pharaoh Man with the Mega Buster Only! Tip: You can charge your Weapon holding down the shoot button (Bonus Points: Beat him without charging your Weapon)
Beat Spark Mandrill! You only have dash and a heart tank to do it (Dash is on the A Button).
Finish world 5-4. BONUS: Get the mushroom near the start (above the giant fire bar) and keep it the whole way through.
Beat world 7-2 and collect all 28 coins on the way!

Clear the "Up 'n' Down" Stunt Track with all 35 stars. Hint: The Truck is your friend. Use boosts on jump ramps. (Use select to change the camera view, Y is boost, B is acceleration, A is brake. L/R for hard turns)
Defeat Edi.E in one minute! (State 3)
Play level 6 on medium speed and clear it. You don't need to clear the stage. Only 1 try.
Beat the boss at the end of the car stage. You need to hit its head to damage it. BONUS: Collect 30 coins in the stage (counter starts at 45).
Take your meds, but not those ones! Eat every pellet except the Power Pellets in a 1:30. Eating a power pellet is a restart!
Clear 24 screens in 3 minutes. Just keep going, it's completely random!! Play normal mode, so you start with all weapons!
Clear 12 screens in 2 minutes. Just keep going, it's completely random!! You have all the weapons by the way. BONUS: Clear 16 screens in the same time limit.
Clear 24 screens in 3 minutes. Just keep going, it's completely random!! By the way, you start with all the weapons.
Clear 15 screens in 2 minutes. Just keep going, it's completely random!! You have all the weapons by the way. BONUS: use only P. Stone.
Clear 24 screens in 3 minutes. Just keep going, it's completely random!! By the way, you start with all the weapons.

In Stage 1 of Mega Turrican. Reach the massive elevator that spawns enemies and survive till you reach the end under three minutes.  Use your invurnable morph ball and Grappling Hook to get through it quickly.
Beat levels 30-32 in two minutes. (hint: pop lightning bubbles to shoot a bolt in the opposite direction of your character)
Survive the weird miniboss rush (including Bizarro Belmont). Pretty tough, but the player starts with full lives & weapons. Press A+B to toggle between stationary shooting mode.
Beat 3 Mini levels on hard without running out of lives. Hold A or B to turn on the Pac Speed Booster.
The level didn't load right! What the hell is this?! Find all the pellets, but some of them are invisible because of TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES. Good luck! Hold A or B to turn on the Pac Speed Booster.
The level didn't load right! What the hell is this?! Find all the pellets, but some of them are invisible because of TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES. Good luck!
Beat 2 Mini levels on CRAZYwithout running out of lives! Hold A or B to turn on the Pac Speed Booster. Pac fast!
Beat 2 mini levels on normal without running out of time or lives. Hold A or B to turn on the Pac Speed Booster.
From where I started you in stage 4-3, finish it. Start button switches weapons, you have plenty. BONUS: Beat the boss.
Collect all 23 coins and beat world 1-3 in 90 seconds. BONUS: Do it in 50 seconds.
Clear the first stage and get out in under 2 minutes. Collect a few powerups from the rocks before trying to take on the scorpion boss.
In the tree stage, reach 7 lives total. Gather extra lives by hitting wasps multiple times instead of letting them fall.
End the bonus round while holding over 250 pins! Watch out for the pin-stealing moles and the black pins that hurt your toad! BONUS: Get over 400 pins like a proper battlemaniac.
Turbo Tunnel, section A! Clear the first two checkpoints within 2 minutes. BONUS: Clear the third one in the time limit as well.
Turbo Tunnel, section B! The first two checkpoints are cleared already. Finish the rest of the stage!
Karnath's Revenge: Finish the Spring and Summer portions within 3 minutes. The snakes can't hurt you, but the spikes can.

Tracktors: Get to the end without being buzzed, OR collect 75k points before running out of lives! Hold the D-Pad the way your toad is facing to move faster. Danger signs want you to prepare to duck (B) and [!] signs signify an upcoming jump (A).
collect 250 dominoes in the 2nd bonus level. Watch out for the point-stealing moles! Black dominoes drain your health. BONUS: Get 400 pins like a proper battlemaniac.
Rat race in the dark tower! Beat the rat to the first two plungers and press Y to blow him up! BONUS: Do all 3 races, like a proper battlemaniac.
Clear stage 1-3 in 2 minutes! You can walk on rainbows, and trap/defeat enemies with them, but you can't jump on them! (If you die, you come back invincible, so take advantage of that time!)

Clear stage 2-3 in 2 minutes! Watch out for the tanks, they both shoot and fall from ledges! You can walk on rainbows, and trap/defeat enemies with them, but you can't jump on them! (If you die, you come back invincible, so take advantage of that time!)

Ascend stage 2-4 and defeat Choppy at the end of the stage in 2 minutes! You can walk on rainbows, and trap/defeat enemies with them, but you can't jump on them, only off them! You'll need to use them as platforms to make it through this challenge!

Beat stage 3-2 in 2 minutes! You can walk on rainbows, and trap/defeat enemies with them, but you can't jump on them, only off them! You'll need to use them as platforms to make it through this challenge! (If you die, you come back invincible, so take advantage of that time!)

Beat stage 4-1 in 2 minutes! You can walk on rainbows, and trap/defeat enemies with them, but you can't jump on them, only off them! You'll need to use them as platforms to make it through this challenge! (If you die, you come back invincible, so take advantage of 6that time!)
Beat Robby the robot! You ain't got no powerups because I'm a jerk! You have 3 lives. You can walk up your rainbows or hold jump to bounce of them. Good luck!

Defeat the flying enemies and collect the energy they leave to open a portal to the next level. You win after entering the portal. Use left/right+A to cling to or jump off walls and down+A to drop through some floors. Bonus: Make it through the portal with full power (the meter in the lower right).

Defeat the flying TARGET enemies and collect the energy they leave to open a portal to the next level. You win when you enter the portal. Use left/right+A to cling to or jump off walls and down+A to drop through some floors. Bonus: Enter the portal within 30 seconds.

Defeat all the flying scorpion enemies and enter the portal to the next level. The first will appear after about 20 seconds. You start with full power and range on your attacks, but death resets it to 0, so reload state if you die.
Run through the short stage and defeat the boss. Use down+B to kick diagonally upward, and left/right+A to cling to or jump off walls.
Grab the Wheel power. Race the 'fuse' to the bottom of the room and make it into the left-most door in one minute!
Mario can't be the only one with airship challenges! Clear level 4-3 in under two minutes! [Difficulty could be tweaked by bumping the time down to a minute and a half however.]

Test Kirby's mettle by dragging the Sword power into the pirate ship of level 6-3. Clear the stage in 2 minutes! (You'll need to kill the guy with the hammer to open up the ladder's path!) Bonus: Clear the level without losing Kirby's Hanzo steel.

State 8: Redline your Kirb through the short level 3-1 in under 90s! You'll really need to keep and use Wheel power to do this quickly (at least until you've beaten the mini-boss.) Using the B button while already wheeling around will bring Kirby out of wheel mode.
Beat Act 1 in under 90s.
Go through the graveyard and defeat the Ghost in 3 minutes. (L&R to switch weapons) Deflect the ghost's projectiles back at it to take it down!
Climb up and exit stage 5-1. [if this proves easier than a 4, bonus could be to defeat Firebug in the next stage]
Get through stage 4-2. It's pretty tough!
Beat the first stage in 90 secs. Bonus if you can beat it without visiting the shop.
Beat Green Hill Zone Act 2 in 90 sec. Bonus if you find the hidden Chaos Emerald
Beat the Chimera in 1 min. Bonus if you can beat him in 30 seconds.
Beat all of Turquoise Hill Zone in 3 minutes
Finish the first two acts of Sky High Zone in 2 min 30 seconds
Totally Not Adventure Island: Beat stage one in 90 seconds

GameTitle: Deep Duck Trouble Starring Donald Duck
ChallengeDetails: Treasure diving: beat the sunken ship and get the golden tooth in 3 minutes. Hint Donald can kick boxes

Gibllets: Beat the first 4 mid boss in 3 minutes. They are the ones that bonus points when you kill them. (1 is Punch, 2 is Kick, Up is jump and down and then up is High jump. And if you hear the Music change when you grab an item that means youre invincible. )
100 Crack Fist: Beat Ryu in 1 minute, Bonus if you can beat him in 30 seconds.
Has-been Mascot: Beat this stage in 90 seconds. The Rice ball in the wall is the goal.
Stone Paper Scissors: beat this stage in 3 minutes, Bonus if you can beat it in a 90 seconds.

From the start of the game, make it to Stage 1-3 in under 3 minutes! To clear stages, just keep killing enemies until the 'Enemy' meter fills up! Hold B to shoot your gun, tap B to throw grenades. Hold A to move faster to dodge bullets, or hold A and hit diagonal down to roll! Bonus: Do it on one life.
Are you a bad enough dude to kill a submarine with a machine gun and some grenades? Prove it! Hold B for Gun, tap B for grenades, A button allows running and rolling.
Clear the stage with the 4 lives you have! Hold B to shoot, tap B to grenade, and A lets you run faster and roll to dodge shots.
From the start of the game, get to the first Bonus Round in 90s.

GameTitle: Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
ChallengeDetails: Beat Moldorm, the boss at the top of the tower of Hera. Reloading isn't allowed. Try not to fall off!
Get to and defeat the boss of Stage 5 (Bonus: Don't Die) You can Run (Y), Throw apples (A), and Glide (R) PLEASE USE THE RUN AND GLIDE BUTTONS PLEASE
Escape from hell... er, the lamp? (complete the level). You can Run (Y), Throw apples (A), and Glide (R) PLEASE USE THE RUN AND GLIDE BUTTONS PLEASE
Complete the first two areas of Stage 6 (two sign posts) You can Run (Y), Throw apples (A), and Glide (R) PLEASE USE THE RUN AND GLIDE BUTTONS PLEASE
Get to and defeat Jafar's first form. You can Run (Y), Throw apples (A), and Glide (R)
Defeat Wolfduck! Remember, he's easiest to shoot when he's transitioning between big and small mode. (Modified by Smite)
Stage 1: Get past the graveyard and reach the pillar on the hill overlooking the tidal waves area.
Stage 1 (halfway): Get through the brain field and slay the cockatrice!
Stage 2: Get through the ghost ship and reach the raft leading to the next section. BONUS: Do it without taking a single hit.
Stage 3: Get through the lava area and reach the Red Arremer Ace waiting at the checkpoint. The goal is to die to him, as is proper.
Stage 4: Get through the rotating spikey maze area and reach the next section.
Stage 5: Climb upwards past the spikes, flowers and yetis to reach the snowy cave area at the top.
Stage 5 (halfway): Get through the snow field and slay the Red Arremer Ace waiting at the end!
Stage 5 (halfway): Cross through the avalanche zone and defeat the Crystal Idiot at the end to open the door. Note: holding still on a ladder makes you immune to avalanches.
Stage 6: It's the Red Arremer Aces! Take the first two down in 2 minutes. BONUS: Take the 3rd one down too within the time limit!

GameTitle: Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
ChallengeDetails: Blind's disguise has fallen through! Kill him in two minutes without any healing. All you have for the job is 12.5 hearts and your sword.

GameTitle: Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
ChallengeDetails: Archery practice! Get 5 in a row in the arrow game (the 64 rupees reward) within 90 seconds.

GameTitle: Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
ChallengeDetails: Welcome to RNG hell! Find the heart piece in the digging game. You get 3 tries.

GameTitle: Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
ChallengeDetails: Take down Mothula! You have enough magic for a few fire rod shots and 1 bottled fairy.

GameTitle: Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
ChallengeDetails: Do two laps in Cucco hell! Watch out for push boys!

Start the game and beat the boss of Yamato 1 to collect the Phoenix tile. Down+B places a block you can stand on and can be used in midair. Warps are illegal! If you see a cavelike entrance behind broken blocks do not press up to enter it or you will have to reset.

Collect the Phoenix tile at the end of Yamato 2. Time limit is 2m. Down+B places a block you can stand on and can be used in midair. Warps are illegal! If you see a cavelike entrance behind broken blocks do not press up to enter it or you will have to reload state.

Beat the boss of Yamato 3 and collect the Phoenix tile. Bonus: Collect the power-up that gives you 99 blocks and max health. Down+B places a block you can stand on and can be used in midair.Warps are illegal! If you see a cavelike entrance behind broken blocks do not press up to enter it or you will have to reload state.

Defeat the boss of Yamato 4 and collect the Phoenix tile. Bonus: Do so without dying or reloading state. Down+B places a block you can stand on and can be used in midair. Warps are illegal! If you see a cavelike entrance behind broken blocks do not press up to enter it or you will have to reload state.

Defeat the boss of Yamato 6 and collect the Phoenix tile. Down+B places a block you can stand on and can be used in midair. Warps are illegal! If you see a cavelike entrance behind broken blocks do not press up to enter it or you will have to reload state.
Escape from Yamato 8 either by collecting the Phoenix tile at the end of the stage or using a warp. Down+B places a block you can stand on and can be used in midair.

Collect the Phoenix tile at the end of Future 1. Down+B places a block you can stand on and can be used in midair. You can destroy SOME of the terrain here too! Warps are illegal! If you see a cavelike entrance behind broken blocks do not press up to enter it or you will have to reload state.
Clear the stage! Watch out for pits! Jump and slice!
Defeat the crazy snake thing by turning all of its segments red! Left rotates clockwise and right rotates the other way.

Beat the cyan team! Your special moves are: A while descending from a jump = Big Elbow. B as you land from a jump = Bomb Kick. Hold B to call your partner over for a grapple, then press A to do a Team attack, or to Piledriver him if you fuck up the timing (center the bars at the bottom).
Beat Kunio and Riki! Press A near a downed enemy head to Mach stomp, running jump + down for High Spin Kick, left/right during a running jump kick to bounce off
score a touchdown before the end of quarter. bonus points if you score on fist drive or convert (in game timer)
Play Race to 25 at Swanky's Sideshow and not only win but do so by 5 points or more! Left or Right, B to throw. (Head down from the state to Swanky's Sideshow)

GameTitle: Tiny Toon Adventure: Buster's Hidden Treasure
ChallengeDetails: Summon Dodo (collect 50 carrots and press A)
starting from last check point beat the boss of level 2 before you run out of lives (don't forget to change)
get to the boss of level 4 after passing the lava maze before you game over
level 4 starting from boss check point get past the lave maze and the final gate before you game over

GameTitle: The Twisted Tales of Spike McFang
ChallengeDetails: Trigger Felina's Limit Break. You'll know it when you see it. Victory and a bonus if you somehow break her AI and defeat her instead.
You have 2 rounds to beat Piston Honda! Press down to block his Piston Rush. Bonus: beat him without blocking.
Beat stage 3-2's checkpoint as the T-birds in 2 minutes.  Beware the water!
Reach the boss door as the T-birds in 3 minutes from the checkpoint.  Beware.  There are lots of ways to insta-die here.
Reach the truck in Stage 4 in 2 tries. No time limit.  You are not required to beat the truck.  I'd recommend Hot Flash for the stage because they maneuver better and faster.

A button does a fullscreen attack, B shoots, and C rolls.  You can do a jump attack if you dash and roll, and attack in the air.  Load state, and defeat first boss without dying.  You have a few hits left.



Whirlpool2 checksum of ROM is 248d5274ca922335d1ed6b6ebb9912508fdd982b22342fe757655255385b9a7bcdecec367ccb452b53dff85858655dea12778520d68b582269c37647f67352a8
B button shoots, C button rolls.  Cannot jump over boss due to size.  You have 3 hits worth of life left.  Defeat boss without dying to win, bonus points for doing it in under 30 seconds(!).
Use directional keys to move reticle and hold down B button to shoot.  Shoot anything that moves to survive, but regardless, kill the final boss, the giant brain, without dying, to win.
Defeat Yamato Man using only the buster! You can charge your shots.
Defeat Marx only using the Plasma Ability. Press the D-Pad directions tocharge the plasma for more damage.
Make it through Stage 2-2 including avoiding Elmyra without getting hit.  You have 2 minutes.
Beat Stages 3, 4, and 5 of the Jumpy Man world in under 2 minutes! (B pushes tiles. Stages are beat when all the enemies are cleared by smashing them into walls!)

Beat Stage 5 of the Swimming Man world in under 2 minutes! The stage is full of respawner tiles, so killed enemies will come back. Each tile can only respawn once though! (B pushes tiles. Stages are beat when all the enemies are cleared by smashing them into walls!)
Beat the first 4 Stages of the Punk Man world in under 2 minutes! (B pushes tiles. Stages are beat when all the enemies are cleared by smashing them into walls!)
Survive the stage for 90 seconds! You can shove tiles, but do not beat the stage normally! (B pushes tiles. Stages are beat when all the enemies are cleared by smashing them into walls!)
Make it through the Big Guys' Town. They take lots of hits to kill! Also watch out for bird ambushes. Challenge's won when you meet the red crow.
Cross the Bridge of Fire and defeat the Dragon. Beware of fire jets and white demons rising from the lava.
Start a new game. Beat the red devil. BONUS: Beat the whole level!

Beat Iceland! The court is frozen over. Don't accidentally slide over the lines! Double-tap forward to run, B attacks and catches (with timing), A passes. Run 5~ steps and then attack for super attacks!
Beat Kenya! The ground here is tougher to run on than usual. Double-tap forward to run, B attacks and catches (with timing), A passes. Run 5~ steps and then attack for super attacks!
Beat Japan! Watch out for Fuji's killer move. Double-tap forward to run, B attacks and catches (with timing), A passes. Run 5~ steps and then attack for super attacks!
Beat the U.S.S.R. brick wall team!! Double-tap forward to run, B attacks and catches (with timing), A passes. Run 5~ steps and then attack for super attacks! They will help a lot against all this HP.

A is punch, B is kick, C+up is high jump.  Get to the end of stage one (don't fight boss), fully powered up (blue dogs have powerups, 3 powerups required).  Bonus points for completing challenge in under 1 minute.

State 1: Beat Stage 6! Bonus: Score at least 7 points in the bonus game that follows! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
State 2: Beat Stage 9! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
State 3: Beat Stage 10! Bonus: Do so with a 3-0 win! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)

State 4: Beat Stage 12! Bonus: Score at least 7 points in the bonus game that follows! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
State 5: Beat Stage 15! Bonus: Do so with a 3-0 win! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
State 6: Beat Stage 17! Bonus: Do so with a 3-0 win! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
State 7: Beat Stage 20! Bonus: Do so with a 3-0 win! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
State 8: Beat Stage 24! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
State 9: Beat Stage 29! (B kicks to your right, Y kicks to your left. Hold down either to charge up your meter and launch the ball hard with X.)
Get the 1st kill of the game.
Beat world 1-2 without killing any enemies. (Ignore the similar challenge i submitted to team battle earlier)
A is punch, B is kick, C+up is high jump.  Get to the boss (boss emits lightning bolts) with 3 powerups (from blue dogs), you transform on the third powerup.
A button punches, B button kicks, C+up high jumps.  Beat the boss in less than a minute.  Extra points if you do it in less than 15 seconds.

Get to the end of the stage in one minute and fifteen seconds. Avoid the gas cloud and watch out for damaged pipes. Use your grappling hook when you reach a dead end and press down and jump to go into your morph ball

(Bonus - difficulty 4: Beat the Stage under 41 Seconds)
(Bonus - difficulty 5: Reach the end of the stage without taking damage)

Doing both of these bonues at the same time is suicidal and is not recommeneded. Doing both impresses no one but your own sad ego.

Beat the Wormland Level and the boss after it in 3 minutes and 45 seconds. Recommened weapon usage against the boss is upgrading the Flamethrower (Red orbs) or Spread Shot (Green orbs), the additional missle powerup and Smart Bombs.

The morph ball & freeze beam is not needed however the grappling hook for the boss can help a bit though not required.

Bonus: Collect all the Gems (brown crested circle things) in the Wormland level and defeat the boss as well to complete the bonus. The end of the Wormland stage will tell you if you missed any and you will gain a life if you got all.

P.S to Smite. Can you please play the Wormland Soundtrack from Super Turrican 2 when this challange is on Smite? We must get the full Chris Huelsbeck experience.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dzTuegPnqF8

3D On-Rails Time! Survive till the end of the stage on your hoverbike. You have only one chance at this. You have only two functions. Jump to dash forward and shoot to...well shoot. You have two lives to start off with which should be fair enough.

Bonus: Don't Die as in lose a life. Preety much explanatory.

My god a Giant Spider in Space.
Beat the Stage and after that the Boss in 3 minutes 30 seconds. Depending on how well you do in the stage. This can be a cakewalk or hell against the boss. Even if you do well in the stage, remember that you still have a time limit of 3m 30s.

Usage of the grappling hook is vital against the boss.

Reach The Machine and beat him that he retreats into his ship. Time Limit is not necessary as the player will have only three lives. No continues.

Using the Morph Ball (down + jump) is vital as it's a good way to avoid taking damage and move fast from attacks. However there is a usage bar under your health and once it's depleted you won't be able to use it again. It can also lay mines but it's not worth much in my opinion.  Freeze beam won't work on The Machine but can work on his mooks when heading to him. Use your Smart Bomb as well.

And Remember. Shoot or Die!

Beat the Final Boss on Hard Mode. Time limit is not necessary for continues are a no go. You have three lives.

The tips I will give are vital in dealing with this challenge. Keep moving forward at all times otherwise you will touch the flames and that's an instant death. Use the Morph Ball (Down + Jump) to avoid damage and move fast. Smart Bombs (Nuke Icon) are essential but only use them when the boss's weak spot is on the ground (when he's looking at you upside down) and pay attention to the boss's patterns and weapons to dodge away from damage.

Good Luck.

A to punch, B+down to kick upwards, C+up for high jump.  Get three powerups (from blue dogs) to the boss of the stage (emits lightning) so that the screen isn't scrolling anymore to complete challenge.

A is attack, B is jump attack, C+up is jump attack.  Defeat boss to complete challenge.  Be aggressive or you will lose!  Bonus points if defeated in less than 30 seconds.

A button is projectile attack, B button is fast jump attack, C button is jump.  Defeat the boss to win.  Be aggressive but pay attention to pattern.  Bonus points for beating boss in less than 40 seconds.
A button is punch, B button is kick, C+up is high jump.  Get to the boss (emits lightning) after getting 3 powerups (kill blue dogs), so that the screen isn't scrolling, to complete this challenge.

A button is projectile, B button is horizontal attack, C+up button to high jump.  Defeat final boss--high jump and horizontal attack (take your time!).  You have more lives than normal, and can reload state if you game over.  Bonus if you defeat boss in less than 1 minute.
It's time for this story to happy end. Kill both Satans with the Shield and kill the Devil to rescue the princess! (This final boss is embarassing.)
Finish a Time Trial of Rainbow Road under 2 minutes, with any character you want! 1 minute to warm up on the track is allowed!

Get three stars at once against Glass Joe and use them to get a TKO!. Tip: Dodge his hooks and then land 7 punches in succession (6 body blows and 1 to the head), you get stars after doing that 3x in a row.
Beat the first 3 rounds of Game A... at 200% emulation speed!
Defeat the Lantern Man.
Defeat the Lantern Man. (Press R to change weapons, but use your coins wisely!)
Win $160 or more in the Paint Minigame. (Read the in-game instructions for rules)
Reach the top of the elevator at the end of the section! Hold attack to charge your jetpack. Careful with that!

Navigate the Craggy Mountain and defeat the outlaw's leader! (A jumps, B Shoots/loads empty gun, Select changes ammunition)
BONUS OBJECTIVE: Reach the boss without firing a single shot, then defeat him! (Punching is OK, Using your gun on the boss is OK)
Great Cave Offensive: Starting at the Castle save room, collect three treasure chests in two minutes. You're free to choose which ones.
Defeat Fatty Whale without creating a partner (don't press A)! You may pick any of the abilities in the room before the boss.
Defeat Raphael the Raven! Bonus: Don't get hit and finish the stage with 100 points!
Hit that Switch! Just beat the level within the time limit.
Fuzzies' Revenge! Clear the Fuzzy room in 4-1 without getting dizzy by touching a Fuzzy. You get one chance!
